## BlockPolledLiquityStore class

Ethers-based [LiquityStore](./lib-base.liquitystore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BlockPolledLiquityStore extends EthersLiquityStore<BlockPolledLiquityStoreExtraState> 
```
